body.p: offers an Oxygen AI Translator add-on provides AI-powered translation capabilities for XLIFF (XML Localization Interchange File Format) files. This add-on streamlines the translation workflow by leveraging advanced AI models to produce high-quality translations while maintaining the structural integrity of your XML content.

The add-on contributes an AI Translator side-view. To initiate the installation process for the add-on, select AI Translator from the Tools menu. Once installed, selecting the action opens the AI Translator view.
For information about the Oxygen AI Translator and its features, see the Oxygen AI Translator add-on.
